machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;(**** start of start-gcode for Edison Bio NK 1.57.70.0 BI-P2-01-999999-9990 ****)
G21; set units to mm,
G90; set positioning to absolute
;M104 S0 T0 (set extruder temperature)
G92 Z0
G1 Z20 F120
G28 X Y F1000 (home XY axes maximum)
G28 Z F120 (home Z axis minimum)
M1010 S1
G95 P2
;G1 Z20 F1500
;G1 X119 Y20 F800
;M109 S0 T0 ;wait for extruder to reach temperature
;M106 P4 S255 ;uv led1
;M106 P3 S255 ;uv led2
M1015 P0 F60.0 E-0.5
G92 E0 (Set E to 0 again)
T0 ;Switch to the first extruder
;(**** end of start-gcode ****)

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;(**** start of end-gcode for Edison Bio NK 1.57.70.0 BI-P2-01-999999-9990 ****)
M73 P100
;end progress
M104 T0 S0
;extruder heater off
M106 P4 S0 ;uv led1
M106 P3 S0;uv led2
M1010 S0 ; TM ;(**** end of end-gcode ****)
